# ix-button

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description        | Type                       | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------ | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable the button | `boolean`                  | `false`     |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | Icon name          | `string`                   | `undefined` |
| `loading`  | `loading`  | Loading button     | `boolean`                  | `false`     |
| `outline`  | `outline`  | Outline button     | `boolean`                  | `false`     |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type of the button | `"button" \| "submit"`     | `'button'`  |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Button variant     | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
